scripts.version:init: powershell -Command "if (-not (Test-Path 'package.json')) { Write-Host 'package.json not found'; exit 1 }; $pkg = Get-Content package.json -Raw | ConvertFrom-Json; if (-not $pkg.version) { $pkg | Add-Member -NotePropertyName version -NotePropertyValue '1.0.0' }; Set-Content package.json ($pkg | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10); if (-not (git tag -l 'v1.0.0')) { git tag v1.0.0; git push --tags }; Write-Host 'âœ… Version initialized to 1.0.0';"
scripts.version:commit: powershell -Command "git add package.json package-lock.json; git commit -m 'Bump version'; git push"
scripts.deploy-patch: npm run version:bump -- patch && npm run build && npm run version:commit && gh-pages -d dist
scripts.deploy-minor: npm run version:bump -- minor && npm run build && npm run version:commit && gh-pages -d dist
scripts.deploy-major: npm run version:bump -- major && npm run build && npm run version:commit && gh-pages -d dist
